namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_righi15gmd_tropo3.xml
Description This namelist produces figures 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 18 of Righi et al. (2015)
Author Klaus-Dirk Gottschaldt (DLR, Germany - klaus-dirk.gottschaldt@dlr.de)
Contributors Franziska Frank (DLR, Germany - franziska.frank@dlr.de) Mattia Righi (DLR, Germany - mattia.righi@dlr.de) Veronika Eyring (DLR, Germany - veronika.eyring@dlr.de)
Project DLR ESMVal
References Righi et al., Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 733-768 10.5194/gmd-8-733-2015 (2015)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################

diag.description: Prepare RMSD grading for portrait plot and Taylor plot for tropoz: This is in preparation of fig. 11 (top left) and fig. 12 (bottom left)

Collect and finish Taylor plot for tropoz (fig 12 bottom left). Output from all previous calls to perfmetrics_taylor.ncl is collected, then reset. variable_def_dir, variable, field_type are dummies here.

Prepare RMSD grading for portrait plot and Taylor plot for toz: Temporary data for RMSD portrait plots are continued, but a new Taylor plot is started. This is in preparation of fig. 11 (top left) and fig. 12 (top left).
RMSD portrait plot for toz and tropoz (fig 11 top left), Taylor plot for toz (fig 12 top left). variable_def_dir, variable, field_type are dummies here.
Prepare BIAS grading portrait plot for tropoz.
Continue preparation of BIAS grading portrait plot, now for toz.
BIAS portrait plot for toz and tropoz (fig 11 bottom left). variable_def_dir, variable, field_type are dummies here.
